item.title: Apple Releases Final Cut Camera 2.0 With New iPhone 17 Features
item.description: Apple today released version 2.0 of its Final Cut Camera app for the iPhone, with support for new features across the iPhone 17 and iPhone Air lineup. Final Cut Camera 2.0 supports ProRes RAW video re
